pages.text: I have never seen such a funny and absurd story.But now I'm lucky to enjoy it.The story written by the author is set in ancient times,but it uses a lot of very modern words.Maybe the author should improve his writing level,maybe that's why he refused to sign.$(br)  Whatever,it is also appreciated to be able to fabricate such absurd stories.But I haven't seen the ancient people use the word "mental hospital"or "psychologist" in the literature.

pages.title: Publisher's comments
pages.text: Finally, I would like to thank the anonymous contributor again,let me see such an interesting story,I agree to publish this book on behalf of Block Press.
